“Where can I buy your stuff?”

I sell my art on consignment at a selection of small businesses in Chicago, mostly on the North side.

Stores where I typically stock my zines:

  • Quimby’s Bookstore
  • Hey, I Thought of You
  • Chicago Comics
  • Uncharted Books
  • Alleycat Comics
  • Women & Children First
  • Howling Pages

Stores where I stock zines, handmade prints, stickers, sewn items, and other goodies:

  • Hey, I Thought of You

You can also buy digital items, such as PDFs of my zines, via my Gumroad Store.

If you have something specific you’re inquiring about, feel free to reach out via email or Instagram.
